channel.title: 504 Gateway Timeout when accessing moparisthebest.com from a mobile network
channel.description: Hey guys, don't know if anyone else has this problem, but whenever I try to connect to moparisthebest.com from my phone, I get a 504 Gateway Timeout error. If I switch my phone to use the wifi instead, i can access it just fine. Is this an error with my phone's mobile network, or with some proxy settings server side? I can access any other page without problem.

item.title: 504 Gateway Timeout when accessing moparisthebest.com from a mobile network
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Moparisthebest:

Does the 504 Gateway Timeout give you any more info? Like the server or anything? I’d bet it’s a problem with your mobile network’s proxy or something.

The full error is

HTTP ERROR: 504

Gateway Timeout

RequestURI=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php

When connecting to https://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php I get the following error:

Secure Connection Failed

An error occurred during a connection to www.moparisthebest.com. Invalid OCSP signing signature in OCSP response. (Error Code: sec_error_ocsp_invalid_signing_cert)

The page you are trying to view cannot be shown because the authenticity of the received data could not be verified.
Please contact the website owners to inform them of this problem. Alternatively, use the command found in the help menu to report this broken site.

Read full topic
item.source: 504 Gateway Timeout when accessing moparisthebest.com from a mobile network

It’s a problem on your end. I just tried it and it worked fine.
